messages.message: Is there a way to access the files used in an app run? I want to download files used for a run to run it again but I don't have it on my computer

If this is on AIHub you can find it at https://aihub.instabase.com/ib-internal by going to your workspace >> AIHub >> search by the build ID >> documents >> input. If you have a link to your build app I can help find them.
Ouh thank you! I'll try and find them

That's a great answer for us, but I'll add that external clients won't have access to the file system like we do (it's one of the features of "advanced apps").

So IMO, this feedback is still a useful ask on behalf of external users.  I actually just ran into this kind of ask earlier today, where I was screen sharing with a client and potentially might have needed to rerun someone else's app run (so I didn't have the files locally).
